item.description:
Join your Beanstalk friends for dinner and a movie. Those that come to dinner get to help pick the movie for the evening. The first to arrive will grab a table at John Harvard's (which is located in Shopper’s World) around 6:30 PM. During dinner we will review what movies are playing and have start times between 7:30 and 8:00 PM. The consensus of attendees is what we'll see.

 

Cost:

Dinner - $12 - $20

Movie - $10.50 adults/$6.00 seniors

 

It is essential that you RSVP.  In the past we have ended up canceling dinner and eating in the theater instead because the movie we all wanted to see started too early to eat in the restaurant. I need to know whom to contact if plans change.

 

Address for the Theater is:

AMC Framingham 16

22 Flutie Pass, Framingham, MA 01701

Telephone:  508-875-6151     

 

Directions:  Take Rt. 9 to Shoppers World.  John Harvard's is in the rear left corner of the mall when facing the mall from Rt. 9.  To get to the theater, leave Shopper’s World from the exit closest to Joe’s American Bar and Grill, turn right, then take your first left onto Flutie Pass.  The AMC will be on you left.
item.how_to_find_us: Call me on my cell phone. Please send me an e-mail with your cell phone number if I don't already have it and I'll send you mine.
item.name: Dinner & a Movie Night
